findings.title: Fire-and-forget blocklist upsert in process-submission.ts
findings.issue: Critical-scan blocklist upsert used import().then() fire-and-forget pattern.
findings.resolution: FIXED — changed to await with try/catch, matching finalize-scan pattern.

findings.title: Inconsistent error handling between process-submission and finalize-scan critical block paths
findings.issue: process-submission used fire-and-forget while finalize-scan used synchronous try/catch.
findings.resolution: FIXED — both paths now use identical try { await import(); await upsert(); } catch {} pattern.
